caption.p: Scintigraphic images obtained 5 h after AO injection of free radiolabel. External radioactive markers were placed at the second cervical (C2) vertebra ( a, b), the first (T1) ( c, d), seventh (T7) ( d, e), thirteenth (T13) ( e, f), and eighteenth (T18) ( f) thoracic vertebrae. A weak radioactive signal from free 99mTc-HMPAO reached the lumbar area by 5 h after injection ( f). Uptake was apparent in the thyroid gland ( a, b) due to diffusion of the free label outside of the subarachnoid space (arrows)
